The MUV of recorded medicinal plants was determined by applying the following formula [20]:
MUV =
∑ U
R i
N
. Where
∑ U
R i
: the total number of use reports per plants and N is the total of interviewees questioned for given medicinal species. The MUV rate will be more important if there are several useful records for a species, implying that the plant is significant, whereas they will be near 0 if there are few reports compared to its use [21].
